prompts: Create a sleek, white Pokemon with a fluffy tail and agile movements.
I want a Pokemon resembling a small, swift mammal with piercing blue eyes.
Generate a quadrupedal creature with a mix of brown and white fur patterns.
Make a Normal-type Pokemon that thrives in forest and urban environments.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a playful personality and enjoys exploring grasslands.
Design a Pokemon that resembles an agile runner, perfect for fast-paced battles.
Show me a furry creature with a keen sense of smell and quick reflexes.
